String.name: Convergence
String.tooltip:
Summon your guild members to your side. Does not work on characters in dungeons or battlegrounds.

Costs $H_W_GOOD480$COLOR_END Guild Funds.

String.name: Battle Will
String.tooltip:
Increases the Attack Speed and PvP Attack of all guild members by $H_W_GOOD10$COLOR_END. Effects last 5 minutes. Does not work on characters in dungeons or battlegrounds.

Costs $H_W_GOOD2400$COLOR_END Guild Funds.

String.name: Impregnable
String.tooltip:
Increases the PvP Defense of all guild members by $H_W_GOOD20$COLOR_END. Effects last 5 minutes. Does not work on characters in dungeons or battlegrounds.

Costs $H_W_GOOD1440$COLOR_END Guild Funds.
